input.sentences: during a visit to my hometown i decided to stroll down memory lane .
my old school looks oddly smaller than i remember .
so many memories in the school yard where i made lifelong friends .
it was sad to see the basketball net in disrepair .
the front door was open so i took this shot before leaving .
output.sentences: Going back to visit this old school was a stroll down memory lane.
I oddly remember the silliest things that happened there.
The schools play yard holds a lot of memories for me.
It is sad to see the goal and net is such disrepair.
I took this snap shot as I was leaving the old schoolhouse from the front.
